markdown:
{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Mokeha |image = Portrait_Mokeha_Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Mokeha.png |caption = |race = Aumaua |subrace = Island |gender = Female |culture = [Deadfire Archipelago](/deadfireArchipelago/) |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = Druid |subclass = Animist |level = 4 |MIG = 17 |CON = 13 |DEX = 13 |PER = 12 |INT = 13 |RES = 14 |health = 81 |damage = 13-18 {{crush}} |accuracy = 27 |penetration = 9 |deflection = 41 |fortitude = 54 |reflex = 44 |will = 43 |dr = 5 |dr crush = 3 |dr freeze = 3 |ability = [Among the Waves](/amongTheWaves/), [Spiritshift Boar](/spiritshiftBoarDeadfire/), [Talons' Reach](/talonsReachDeadfire/), [Vile Thorns](/vileThornsDeadfire/), [Blizzard](/blizzardDeadfire/), [Burst of Summer Flame](/burstOfSummerFlameDeadfire/) |location = [Sﾄ》ahuzi](/satahuzi/) |quests = [Burning Bridges](/burningBridges/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = [Rinco's Coin Purse](/rincosCoinPurse/) |body = Huana Guard Leather Armor |weapon1 = Mace (Deadfire){{!}}Mace |weapon1_offhand = Medium Shield (Heater) (Deadfire){{!}}Medium Shield (Heater) |internalname = NPC_PM_Mokeho |guid = c9e5251f-e9dc-465f-86f0-a0e260ceb1d2 }} '''Mokeha''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|The aumaua woman steps sideways, angling herself towards you, and meets your gaze with an intense stare.}} Mokeha is a proud woman who is a Mataru of the tribe and one of its protectors... But with little knowledge of the world outside of the village. As such, this leads to a lot of confusion, as she assumes the world operates according to Huana philosophy, when it really doesn't. This has recently surfaced in the altercation with [Rinco](/rinco/). ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [Burning Bridges](/burningBridges/) |none = |other = * She does not talk to you if you already stole [Rinco's Coin Purse](/rincosCoinPurse/) from her. }} ## =Quests = * [Burning Bridges](/burningBridges/): She is the culprit of the assault - or so she says. ## Dialogue Introductory dialogue * If the Watcher is a [moon godlike](/moonGodlike/) ** ''"I did not think Clario's outsider to be one of Ngati's favored."
Mokeha's voice is low and halting. Her rigid frown softens, and she folds her arms across her chest.'' * If the Watcher is an [island aumaua](/islandAumaua/) or has the [Deadfire Archipelago](/deadfireArchipelago/) background ** ''"Do you come with the traders, brother/sister? Or have the Kahanga chased you from Neketaka? You are not one of ours."
Her lip curls dismissively.'' * If the Watcher is another [godlike](/godlike/) ** ''"Outsiders of every sort. This is what the Vailians have brought us."
Her scarred brow wrinkles, and her frown deepens into a somber grimace.'' * Otherwise ** ''"I do not know you."
Her voice is quiet, but each word is clipped and harsh.'' [Category:Port Maje characters](/categoryPortMajeCharacters/) [Category:Sﾄ》ahuzi characters](/categorySatahuziCharacters/)

{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Mokeha |image = Portrait_Mokeha_Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Mokeha.png |caption = |race = Aumaua |subrace = Island |gender = Female |culture = [[Deadfire Archipelago]] |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = Druid |subclass = Animist |level = 4 |MIG = 17 |CON = 13 |DEX = 13 |PER = 12 |INT = 13 |RES = 14 |health = 81 |damage = 13-18 {{crush}} |accuracy = 27 |penetration = 9 |deflection = 41 |fortitude = 54 |reflex = 44 |will = 43 |dr = 5 |dr crush = 3 |dr freeze = 3 |ability = [[Among the Waves]], [[Spiritshift Boar (Deadfire)|Spiritshift Boar]], [[Talons' Reach (Deadfire)|Talons' Reach]], [[Vile Thorns (Deadfire)|Vile Thorns]], [[Blizzard (Deadfire)|Blizzard]], [[Burst of Summer Flame (Deadfire)|Burst of Summer Flame]] |location = [[Sﾄ》ahuzi]] |quests = [[Burning Bridges]] |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = [[Rinco's Coin Purse]] |body = Huana Guard Leather Armor |weapon1 = Mace (Deadfire){{!}}Mace |weapon1_offhand = Medium Shield (Heater) (Deadfire){{!}}Medium Shield (Heater) |internalname = NPC_PM_Mokeho |guid = c9e5251f-e9dc-465f-86f0-a0e260ceb1d2 }} '''Mokeha''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== {{Description|The aumaua woman steps sideways, angling herself towards you, and meets your gaze with an intense stare.}} Mokeha is a proud woman who is a Mataru of the tribe and one of its protectors... But with little knowledge of the world outside of the village. As such, this leads to a lot of confusion, as she assumes the world operates according to Huana philosophy, when it really doesn't. This has recently surfaced in the altercation with [[Rinco]]. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [[Burning Bridges]] |none = |other = * She does not talk to you if you already stole [[Rinco's Coin Purse]] from her. }} ===Quests=== * [[Burning Bridges]]: She is the culprit of the assault - or so she says. ==Dialogue== Introductory dialogue * If the Watcher is a [[moon godlike]] ** ''"I did not think Clario's outsider to be one of Ngati's favored."
Mokeha's voice is low and halting. Her rigid frown softens, and she folds her arms across her chest.'' * If the Watcher is an [[island aumaua]] or has the [[Deadfire Archipelago]] background ** ''"Do you come with the traders, brother/sister? Or have the Kahanga chased you from Neketaka? You are not one of ours."
Her lip curls dismissively.'' * If the Watcher is another [[godlike]] ** ''"Outsiders of every sort. This is what the Vailians have brought us."
Her scarred brow wrinkles, and her frown deepens into a somber grimace.'' * Otherwise ** ''"I do not know you."
Her voice is quiet, but each word is clipped and harsh.'' [[Category:Port Maje characters]] [[Category:Sﾄ》ahuzi characters]]
title: Mokeha
